casebody.data:
Karol NIETUPSKI
v.
Nerida DEL CASTILLO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided July 24, 2019 Karol Nietupski, self-represented, in support of the petition. Ramona Mercado-Espinoza, Enelsa Diaz, Giovanna Shay and Christina Gill, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 42003) is dismissed.
